comment: I hate that students judge Dr. Myers harshly because she takes attendance. You're going to be a nurse, you need to commit to showing up. Dr. Myers CARES so much about her students, and her lectures allow you to really talk about your nursing and life experiences. Very interactive. Her tests and assignments are easy if you show up, read and care.

Cares a lot for students! Charismatic and nice. She will keep you there the whole class time which kind of sucks, but so does being a nursing major. It's not her job to let us out early, her job is to teach us. Our job is to learn. Do your job, you'll get an A. Great professor. Get used to long lectures b/c that's how the whole nursing program is.
just no. no don't do it.
Dr. Myers is very nice and knowledgeable! The class was easy but attendance is mandatory and you will be there the entire time!
